long_description: The women's Gregory J28 Pack is built tough for all-day, all-mountain use. Throw in your hiking gear, climbing gear or anything else you may need for an escape into the great outdoors. Ventilated back panel, women-specific harness and wrap-over padding on the hipbelt offer comfort and stability for the long haul. Die-cut foam on the harness and hipbelt adds breathability and decreases weight. CrossFlo(TM) DTS Suspension provides cooling airflow across the back without sacrificing load transfer; wire X-Frame transfers load weight to the lumbar pad and hipbelt. Top-loading main compartment features a quick-draw closure and floating top lid; U-shaped front zipper makes it easy to access the pack's depths. Interior sleeve with port accommodates a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Front bucket pocket and zippered pocket, 2 exterior stretch water bottle pockets and dual hipbelt pockets make it easy to organize and access essentials. The Gregory J28 Pack features hideaway axe/trekking pole loops with secure attachments; side/bottom compression straps; and an integrated, color-matched rain cover.
short_description: The women's Gregory J28 Pack is built tough for all-day, all-mountain use. Throw in your hiking gear, climbing gear or anything else you may need for an escape into the great outdoors.
